## Add finding severities

{{< include /guide/model-validation/_add-finding-severities.qmd >}}

## Edit finding severities

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

2. Under Findings, select **Finding Severities**.

3. Hover over the severity you would like to edit.

4. When the **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** appears, click on it and select **{{< fa pencil >}} Edit Severity**.

5. Make your changes to the **[name]{.smallcaps}** and **[color]{.smallcaps}** of the severity.

6. Click **Update Severity** to apply your edits.


## Reorder finding severities

{{< include /guide/model-validation/_reorder-finding-severities.qmd >}}

## Remove finding severities

::: {.callout-important title="Removal of finding severities is permanent."}
Severities can only be deleted if they are not in use by any findings.

:::

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

2. Under Findings, select **Finding Severities**.

3. Hover over the severity you would like to delete.

4. When the **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** appears, click on it and select [**{{< fa trash-can >}} Delete Severity**]{.red}.

5. After you confirm, the severity will be removed from the list.
